## Divider class

A Divider Custom HTML Element. Implements the [ARIA separator](https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.1/#separator) or [ARIA presentation](https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.1/#presentation)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Divider extends FoundationElement 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [orientation](./fast-foundation.divider.orientation.md) |  | Orientation | The orientation of the divider. |
|  [role](./fast-foundation.divider.role.md) |  | [DividerRole](./fast-foundation.dividerrole.md) | The role of the element. |
